gnyis po bcu gnyis sor bcu pa / /
bskul spyad kha ni mda' ltong 'dra //
'byin pa'i cha spyad lcags kyu'i dbyibs / /
thur ma rtse mo gug pa ni / /
mngal gyi phur pa zhes bya ste / /
srid du sor brgyad byas pa des / /
bud med mngal du bu shi dbyung / /
rde'u 'byin cha spyad sprul mgo yi / /
gdengs ka 'dra la rtse gug pa'o / /
mda' ltong 'dra bar sor bzhi pa / /
so dbyung ba la sbyar bar bya / /
rtse mo ras bal gyis dkris pa'i / /
phyi bsal thur ma drug bya'o / /
gzhang gi nye ring nang la gnyis / /
sor bcu ba dang bcu gnyis pa / /
sna yi sor drug bdun pa gnyis / /
rna ba'i sor brgyad dgu pa gnyis / /
rna ba bsal la a shwad+tha'i / /
rtse'am blugs gzar kha 'dra bya / /
thur ma 'dzam bu'i thor to 'dra / /
thal sman me btsa' so sor gsum / /
phra sbom rim bzhin sbyar bar bya / /
rgyu ma'i las la thur ma ni / /
khar ba 'dra zhing dbus zlum la / /
rtsa ba zla ba phyed 'dra bya / /
rgya shug tshi gu bkas 'dra ba / /
sna yi thor to 'brum sreg byed / /
sor brgyad pa la rtse mo ljon / /
gsum pa thal sman sman rim la / /
mthe'u chung gung mo srin lag gi /
sen mo lta bu'i so byas pa'o / /
pho mtshan spyad dang mig sman stsogs / /
cha spyad rang rang le'ur bshad / /
nye ba'i cha spyad khab long dang / /
thag pa ras dang tho ba dang / /
'bring bu rgyu ma lce rta rda / /
yal ga sren mo kha so dang / /
dus dang smin dang lag rkang dang / /
'jigs dang dga' ba de'i bya ba'i / /
bye brag thabs ni shes pa'o / /
mkhas pas blo yis dpyad par bya / /
cha spyad gdung srub dgang dang rgyun srang dag bya dang / /
thal sman gdab dang mtshon dbyung bcing dang bcer ba dang / /
gzhib dang smad dang stod dang bskyod dang bcag pa dang / /
bzlog dang drang por bya ba tsha spyad las rnams yin / /
legs par zug cing 'byin par byed pa dang / /
gzung bya blangs nas 'byin par byed phyir dang / /
yan lag kun la gnod pa med pas na / /
cha spyad kun gyi mchog ni kang+ka'i mchu / /
yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las / /
mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o // //
de nas gtar spyad kyi cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o / /
mgar ba mkhas pas cho ga bzhin / /
brdungs pa'i gtar spyad nyi shu drug /
spu ni chod par nus pa dag /
phal cher sor ni drug par bya / /
gzugs legs so ni legs pa dang / /
gzung bar bde ba nyid du bya / /
ya yo med cing 'thar legs pa'i / /
shin tu rno ba'i lcags las bya / /
rtse mo shin tu legs brdungs la / /
ut+pal sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba'i / /
rang ming rjes mthun gzugs can ni / /
rtag tu nye bar gzhag par bya / /
rtse mo re re dag la yang / /
rang tshod sor phyed gnyis dang bzhi / /
phal cher gnyis dang gsum du bya / /
de gnas khyad par dag la sbyar / /
de las dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i rtse / /
mdzub sen nang gi dbyibs 'drar bya / /
de ni rnyil skyes lkog ma yi / /
sha lhag la sogs gzhar bcad sbyar / /
'phel gtsags spu gri'i dbyibs lta bu / /
gcod dang dral dang 'byin la sbyar / /
rtse drang skrangs nad mtho ba dang / /
zab pa la sbyar de las gzhan / /
ltag pa ring zhing rtse gug pa / /
so thung nad tshul ji bzhin sbyar / /
ut+pa la dang so phyed kyis / /
dral dang de bzhin gcad par bya / /
sbrul kha rtse sor phyed rna ba / /
sna yi thor bu dpyad la sbyar / /
rma tshol 'jam po rta bla ba'i / /
mgo bo 'dra gzhal brtag par bya / /
de las gzhan pa khab rtse 'dra / /
rtse bug can ni dbug la sbyar / /
ljang pa'i lo 'dra 'bigs pa la / /
sha ri'i mchu 'dra mda' bug ni / /
kha 'dra rtse gsum khrag gzags la / /
'jag rtse a ta'i mchu 'dra ba / /
'bras bu sor gnyis khrag 'byin la / /
de 'dra'i so ni nang du lta / /
gtsags 'bras zla ba kham pa 'dra / /
sor ni phyed dang gnyis yod bya / /
rtse mo 'bras dang 'dra pa la / /
sor ni phyed dang gnyis yod dag /
de ni rtsa lto'i nad la sbyar / /
sta re'i spangs 'dra ba lang so / /
'dra ba'i gtsags 'bras sor phyed pa / /
de yi yu ba gyen bstan la / /
rus pa'i steng gnas rtsa la gdab / /
zangs ma'i thur ma rtse gnyis pa / /
rtse mo me tog kha 'bus 'dra / /
de yis mthong nyams mig sbris dbug /
rgya 'dra'i gcags bu bya ba ni / /
sor gdub 'dra las kha 'byung ba / /
gtsags 'bras rgyar ni sor phyed pa / /
rig pas 'phel gtsags lta bu'am / /
dkyil 'khor lta bu'i rtse 'dra bya / /
de ni mdzub mo'i thor tol / /
gdags su rung ba'i rgya 'dra bya / /
srad bus brtod la gre ba'i nang / /
nad rnams gcad dang dral la sbyar / /
gre ba'i sha lhag thor gtsug 'dzin / /
lcags kyu'i rtse mo legs gug bya / /
rus pa gcod pa'i sog le ni / /
srid du sor bcu zhing sor gnyis / /
so rnams phra zhing rab tu rno / /
yu ba chang gzung legs par bya / /
rma yi chu rgyus skra bcad pa'i / /
chan pa chan pa 'dra bar bya / /
so yo so drang kha gnyis pa'i / /
sen mo 'dreg spyad sor dgu pa / /
zug rngu phra 'byung gcad pa dang / /
dral dang dbug dang phyi bar bya / /
zur bzhi pa la sor gcig pa / /
dbyibs ni kun tu gcig 'dra ba / /
so phyi ba yi gcags spyad de / /
so yi dreg pa phyi bar bya / /
khab ni mgo zlum mig zab che / /
mkhrang pa gsum bya de las ni / /
sha che ba yi phyogs su ni / /
zur gsum srid du sor gsum pas / /
sha chung pa dang rus tshigs na / /
rma yod pa la srid sor gnyis / /
zhu dang ma zhu'i gnas nad rma'i / /
khab rtse 'bras dbyibs gzhu ltar sgu / /
srid du sor ni phyed dang gsum / /
khab ni bdun dang brgyad kun yang / /
zlum po sor ni legs sbom pa / /
khri gcig la btsugs pir 'dra ba / /
brtsan sngo gdong nad thig le gnag /
skra 'byi ba la gtsags par bya / /
khab brgyad zlum po sor phyed pa / /
gcig tu sbom la gzar bu 'dra / /
lag pa gnyis kyis btsugs nas ni / /
de yis sna yi khrag dbyung ngo / /
rna shal dbug pa'i snyung bu ni / /
yu ti ka ni kha 'bus 'dra / /
snyung bu sor ni phyed par bya / /
de yi tshad dbug de yan chad / /
zur bzhi par byas de yis ni / /
skrangs smin ma smin dogs la dbug /
rna drung sha ni stug po dbug /
snyung bu kha ni sbom po la / /
sum cha sbu gu yod byas la / /
sor gsum pa yis rna ba dbug /
pad+ma thal sman me btsa' dang / /
mching bu rdo dum sen mo stsogs / /
lcags min gtar spyad phra mo ste / /
de yang de bzhin sbyar bar bya / /
cha spyad 'khrul 'khor stsogs pas kyang / /
mkho ba nad kyi dmigs dang sbyar / /
'dren dang 'byin dang 'dral dang 'drub / /
dmigs tshol phya bsal zhal zhal gdab / /
gtsags bcad gshegs dbug btsugs pa dang / /
gzung sreg de yis bya ba yin / /
gcad dang dral dang phyi ba'i phyir / /
spyad kyi gtsags 'bras rtsa ba'i bar / /
mdzub mo gung mo mtheb mo yis / /
ma yengs pa dang legs par gzung / /
gtar ga gdab phyir rtse mo'i drung / /
mdzub mo dang ni mthe bos gzung /
'bras 'dra ba yi yu ba ni / /
chang par bcug ste rtse mas gdab / /
dbyung don yu ba nas gzung bya / /
gzhan dag bya ba gang bder bya / /
gtar spyad sna tshogs dag gi snod / /
gso ras bal snam men dri'am / /
pags 'jam du gu la las byas / /
rab tu stug pa zheng sor dgu / /
srid du sar ni bcu gnyis pa /
bal gyis bar bcad spyad bcug la / /
legs par gzhag ste drub pa dang / /
thur mas kha ni brgyu bar bya / /
srin bu pad pa bder gnas pa / /
khrag dbyung phyir ni sbyar bar bya / /
chu nang nya dang sbal stsogs dang / /
mi ro'i dri ma mnam las byung / /
dmar dang dkar dang shin tu gnag /
mi srun sbom dang 'byil ba dang / /
'ja' tshon dang 'dra ro stod bkra / /
spu yod de rnams dug can yin / /
spang bya des ni khrag gzhibs na / /
g.ya' rnags 'dzag rims mgo 'khor skyed / /
de la dugs khrag mkhris gso bya / /
chu mdog rnam par gsal ba dang / /
dug med nya lcibs med las byung / /
rtsa snar ro stong sngo khra zlum / /
rgyab ni ngur smrig 'dra lus phra / /
lto ni cung zad ser ba bzang / /
de yang legs par ma skyugs dang / /
rtag tu 'thung du bcug pa dag /
chu nang zhugs te nub pa ni / /
khrag gis myos pa yin pas spangs / /
de nas cig shos skye rab brtags //
chu sbyar ba yi nang du gzhug /
kan dzi'am dar ba'i nang du gzhug /
slar yang chur ni dbugs phyung nas / /
mar ram sa zhag nu zho 'am / /
khrag gi thigs pa bskus 'thung gzhug /
'thungs tshe ro stod mthor gyur na / /
ras ma srab mos g.yogs par bya /
khrag ni bzang ngan 'dres pa las / /
pad pa dang por nad khrag ni / /
'thungs te ngang pas 'o ma dang / /
'dres chu'i 'o ma len dang mtshungs / /
so yis 'debs pa'am g.ya' gyur na / /
de ni slar dbyung skyug tu gzhug / /
rgyam tsha til mar gyis kha bsku / /
phye ma 'jam pos rgyab tu gtor / /
slar yang zhag bdun bar du ni / /
khrag myos bsrungs la 'thung mi gzhug /
srin bu pad pa legs skyugs na / /
sngon bzhin khong grims brtan par 'gyur / /
drags na dal zhing snyom 'chi 'gyur / /
skyugs ma legs na rengs myos 'gyur / /
bum pa chu dang sa blugs pa / /
gzhan dang gzhan du gzhag par bya / /
kha chu rul bag sbyang phyir bya / /
gzhan du dug dang bcas par 'gyur / /
ma dag pa'am khrag mang byung / /
skyer pa bu ram sbrang rtsis bsku / /
lan brgyar dkrugs mar ras bal gyi / /
ye'us byugs la sman bsil bsku / /
nad kyi khrag dang bral gyur na / /
'phral du rtsa dmar nad med 'gyur / /
ma dag gnas nas bskyod gyur pa / /
rma yi gnas su 'dug pa'i khrag /
zhag lon na ni gnag par 'gyur / /
de bas de ni slar dbyung ngo / /
mkhris rgyas khrag gi nad la ni / /
ku ba bum pa sbyar mi bya / /
de gnyis me dang bcas pa yin / /
rlung dang bad kan la sbyar bya / /
bad kan las gyur nad khrag ni / /
ska bas rngabs rus gzhib mi bya / /
rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur khrag /
rngabs rwas gzhibs te dbyung bar bya / /
lus kyi gong du srad bu'am / /
ras kyis dam du bcings nas ni / /
chu ba tshigs rus gnad rnams ni / /
dor te zhal zhal gdab bar bya / /
gyen du dbyung ba'i thabs kyis ni / /
thur du babs pa gdab bar bya / /
zab dang nye dang 'phred mi gdab / /
btab ba'i gnas su'ang gdab mi bya / /

bem bem por gyur rwa stsogs gdab / /
nad khrag lus khyab gtar ga gdab / /

gting na yod pa pad pas dbyung / /

mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o // //

cung zad mngar zhing tsha bro la / /
grang dang tsha min ska ba min / /
pad+ma lam bu chu gsher dang / /
btsod dang ri bong khrag ltar dmar / /
dag cing dmar ba 'byung ba ni / /
de nyid kyis ni lus gnas byed / /
de ni phal cher bad mkhris kyi / /
nad kyis 'khrugs pas gnod bskyad pas / /
me dbal 'bras dang mcher nad dang / /
skran dang me drod bri dang rims / /

bsil dro snum dang rtsub stsogs kyis / /
nad gang gsos par gyur pa dag /
legs par 'chos par ma gyur pa / /
de ni khrag 'khrugs las gyur yin / /
khrag bdo gyur pa de las ni / /
gtar ga gdab pas dbyung bar bya / /
de yang bcu drug ma lon dang / /
bdun cu 'das la khrag mi dbyung / /
nyam chung dugs drags dugs ma byas / /

snum 'thungs pa la sbyor ba dang / /

'phral ba'i rtsa la gtar ba'am / /

rna ba'i nad la rna ba'i rtsa / /
sna yi nad la sna rtser ro / /

mchu dang rkan gyi rtsar gdab bo / /

smyo byed mig 'gram brang dpral rtsa / /

yang na kun la smin mtshams gdab / /
'bras dang rtsib logs zug pa la / /
rtsib logs nu ma'i bar rtsa gdab / /
nyin gsum pa la phrag mtshams gdab / /
nyin bzhi pa la ltag pa'i 'og /
'khru ba gzer dang ldan pa la / /
mjug to'i gong ma sor gnyis par / /

lkog ma'i wa bar brla rtsa gdab / /
gzugs 'khums pus mthil 'og gam ni / /

rting rdol rlung nad mdzer pa dang / /

'khums la rkang 'khums lta bur gdab / /

lag pa g.yon pas bzung ba yi / /

lag ngar brkyang la gdab par bya / /
rtsib logs rtsa ni dpung pa gnyis / /
thur du dpyangs te gdab bar bya / /

rus pa'i steng rtsa sta re 'dras / /
nas kyi phyed tsam gdab par bya / /
legs par btab nas khrag gzags te / /

gdab ma legs pa dus cung zad / /
nyung zad 'byung ba til phye gdab / /

'byung zhing bcad kyang dka' bar 'gyur / /

dang po nad khrag 'byung par 'gyur / /

khrag bzang byung na'ang dbyung mi bya / /

rlung g.yab kyis g.yab slar khrag dbyung / /

shugs drag gsal zhing lbu ba can / /
mkhris khrag ser la rtsa gnag mnam / /
sbyin bag dro zhing tshon can yin / /
bad kan khrag ni 'jam la skya / /

'dres pa'i mtshan ma 'dres ma yin / /
nyes gsum dri ma rnyog ma can / /
khrag ngan pa ni nyams che la'ang / /
tshad las lhag par dbyung mi bya / /

rlung nad mi bzad 'byung bar 'gyur / /

gos 'jam gyis ni rma kha dkri / /

nad khrag rab rgyas ma gyur ba'am / /
de 'dra'i thabs kyis gso bar bya / /
khrag gi rgyun ni mchod na / /
gcad pa'i sbyor ba myur du bya / /
seng phrom rma shing pri yang ku / /

'o ma can shing shun lo ma / /

shug stsogs chu grang sbyar ba blud / /
yang na rtsa btab de gong gi /

lus zungs gnas ni nang gsher gyi / /
rang gi drod kyis smin pas na / /
bad kan rgyus pa shams g.yogs / /
char bshad shing gi snying po 'dra / /
bdun po de dag gnas bdun te / /
dang por khrag yin gzhan rim bzhin / /
bad kan ma zhu mkhris zhu ba / /
rlung dang gcin gyi gnas su bshad / /
bud med mngal gnas brgyad pa ste / /
mkhris pa zhu ba'i gnas par gnas / /
'di la nang grol yan lag gnas / /
snying glo mchin mkhris mcher mkhal ma / /
pho ba grod pa rgyu ma dang / /
gnye ma long ka lgang pa'o / /
srog gi gnas ni rnam bcu ste / /
mgo dang lce yi rtsa ba dang / /
lkog ma khrag dang snying lte ba / /
chu so khu chu dngas dang gzhang / /
lus la rtsa dra chu ba che / /
re re bcu drug yod par bshad / /
pir 'dra drug dang srubs 'dra bdun / /
pho mtshan lce dang mgo la brten / /
de dag gtsags bus gdab mi rung / /
sha yi thag pa rnam pa bzhi / /
rus pa'i tshogs 'dus bcu bzhi yod / /
mtshams ni dgu phrag gnyis yod la / /
so dang sen mor bcas pa yi / /
rus pa sum brgya drug cu yin / /
thang la 'bar ni sum brgyar 'dod / /
tshigs ni nyis brgya rtsa bcur 'dod / /
rgyun shes bus ni tshigs kyi grangs / /
nyis stong dag ni yod par 'dod / /
rgyus pa dgu brgya skyes pa la / /
sha ni spar tshad lnga brgya yod / /
bud med kyi ni nu ma dang / /
mo mtshan la gnas nyi shu lhag /
rtsa chen rtsa ba snying la gnas / /
de dag kun gyis lus kun khyab / /
dngas ma'i bdag nyid mdangs su 'gyur / /
de ni phra ba kun dang 'brel / /
rtsa ba sbom zhing rtse rab phra / /
lo ma'i rtsa ltar gyes pa yin / /
gyes pa de las rtsa phran ni / /
bdun brgya dag tu gyur pa yin / /
de la yan lag re re zhing / /
brgyad brgyad der ni gnas pa yin / /
de la dbug par mi bya ba / /
rtsa yi dra ba 'dzin zhes bya / /
nang na gnas pa gsum po yin / /
rked par bcu drug phrag gnyis te / /
de las brla rtsar gnyis gnyis dang / /
rked pa'i gnad rnams gnyis gnyis te / /
de brgyad gtsags bus gdab mi bya / /
rtsib logs gnyis la rtsa bcu drug /
de las gyen 'gro zhes bya spang / /
rgyab tu rtsa ni nyi shu bzhi / /
sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis na / /
de las gnyis gnyis gyen 'gro ba / /
mtshon gyis gdab par mi bya'o / /
rgyab bzhin lto na gnas rtsa de / /
pho mtshan steng na gnas pa dang / /
sbu yi phreng ba'i ngos gnyis rtsa / /
gnyis gnyis mtshon gyis mi gdab bo / /
brang la gnas pa bzhi bcu las / /
bcu bzhi dbug par mi bya ste / /
nu ma jing de yi rtsa ba dang / /
snying ga dag ni so sor gnyis / /
gnod bral gnad ni gnyis po dang / /
mi gsal zhes bya gnyis kyi gnyis / /
mgrin pa ltag pa 'dra ba las / /
sngon po mjing pa ltag pa dang / /
'gal pa dang ni ma mo brgyad / /
bcu drug yongs su spang bar bya / /
'gram pa bcu drug de las gnyis / /
mtshams ni 'brel par byed pa spang / /
lce yang 'gram pa dang 'dra ste / /
'og gi ro tshor byed gnyis dang / /
tshig 'byin byed pa gnyis po spang / /
sna yi rtsa ni nyi shu bzhi / /
de las dri tshor byed gnyis dang / /
rkan du 'gro ba'i rtsa gnyis spang / /
mig gnyis kyi ni lnga bcu drug / /
'byed dang 'dzums pa'i las byed pa / /

drug po de dag spang bar bya / /
mig dang snar gnas 'phral ba la / /
brten pa'i rtsa ni drug cu las / /
bzhag pa gcig dang gtsug gi gnyis / /
skra mtshams gnas pa'i rtsa bzhi ste / /
bdun po de dag mtshon gdab spang / /
rna bar bcu drug de las 'dir / /
sgra thos byed pa'i rtsa gnyis spang / /
de nyid las ni mur 'gram gyi / /
mtshams su 'gro ba gnyis po spang / /
spyi bor bcu gnyis de las ni / /
gyen 'gro skra mtshams bdag po las / /
so so'i re re spang bar bya / /
de ltar yan lag re re'i rtsa'i / /
dbye ba dbug min shes phyir bshad / /
de las lus la dbug mi rung / /
ma lus dgu bcu rtsa brgyad yod / /
dog dang rtsa mdud shin tu phra / /
yo dang tshigs la gnas mi dbug /

'dres pa'i mtshan nyid 'dren ma yin / /

de rnams kyis bskor lte ba ni / /

pad+ma'i rtsa ba phra mo las / /

dbugs rings 'byin zhing sa la 'gre / /
gang zhig dbugs rings phyung nas ni / /
thung du rngubs te shugs 'byin dang / /
thung du dbugs 'byin bsnun pa ltar /
shin tu 'dar bar byed pa yang / /
gang zhig lag ngar bskums nas ni /
mgo bo dka' bas 'debs pa dang / /
gang zhig 'phral ba las rdul 'dzag /
tshigs mtshams lhod par gyur pa dang / /
nyams che ba 'am nyam chung gyur pa gang / /
ldang ba'i tshe na mi dran 'gyur / /
gang zhig gan rkyal nyal nas ni / /
rkang pa rnam par bskyod pa dang / /
rtsig pa mal stan la sogs pa / /
gang zhig rtag tu snyes pa dang / /
rgyu med par dgod myongs tshul gyis / /
mchu la ldags par byed pa dang / /
ya mchu ldags par byed pa dang / /
sgra bcas par yang gang byed dang / /
lus mdog nag po ser po dang / /
dmar po'i gzugs brnyan snang ba dang / /
sman pa sman dang kha zas dang / /
bla ma mdza' bshes la sdang gang / /
'di dag thams cad gshin rje yi / /
dbang gyur yin par shes par bya / /
gang zhig drod chung sems g.yengs dang / /
rtag tu mdangs ngan yid mi bde / /
gang zhig gtor ma bya rog la / /
byin yang za bar mi byed dang / /
gang zhig rgyu med yid gzhungs dang / /
mdzes shing lus rgyas dpal thob pa'am / /
de las nyams par gyur pa dag /
de ni gshin rje'i khyim du 'jug /
tha mal par ram nad pa yis / /
gang zhig yon tan skyon rang bzhin / /
snga las gzhan du 'gyur par snang / /
de ni zla drug las mi 'tsho / /
dad dang tshul khrims dran dang sbyin / /
blo gros stobs ni rgyu med par / /
'di drug las ni ldog gyur pa / /

'gro dang tshig ni smyo ba 'dra / /
'dar rmongs zla ba gcig nas 'chi / /

zhag drug nas ni 'chi bar 'gyur / /
gang zhig lkog nad med pa ru / /

bad kan lud par bcas pa dang / /

yang na gnag pa'am tshon can nam / /

gos la ma chags dri ngal / /

lud pa dbugs mi bde rims skyugs // /
skom dang tshad 'khru 'or nad dang / /

brten te stobs che nyid gyur las / /
gnyen por bcas shing 'phel 'bri gnas / /
mi bzad pa ni nyid du 'gyur / /
de rnams kyis ni nad kyi stobs / /
rang gi dus su rims stobs skyed / /
slar yang de dag bcos thabs kyis / /
stobs che chung las ldog par byed / /
nad zad rims ni phrar gyur pa / /
bcud la sogs pa nyid la thim / /
thim pas lus rid sha mdog nyams / /
rmongs bag la sogs de yis skyed / /
nye zhing kha ni bye ba'i phyir / /
dngas ma rgyu ba'i rtsa sgo las / /
lus kun myur du khyab pa ni / /
nad kyis skye bar byed pa yin / /
des na rgyun tu rtag rims 'gyur / /
de las bzlog pa tshul mi 'dra / /
mi snyoms rtsol ba mi mnyam pa / /
bya ba'i dus min mnyam yun ring / /
de ni nyin mtshan lan gnyis ldang / /
gzhan dag nyin re lan re yin / /
phal cher nad ni khrag la brten / /
rtag pa'i rims ni byed par 'gyur / /
de yang nyin mtshan lan gnyis ldang / /
nyin gcig nyin re lan re ldang / /
de ni sha yi rtsa la brten / /
gsum pa tshil gyi rtsa la gnas / /
mkhris pa rlung gnyis spyi nas 'dzin / /
bad kan mkhris gyur sum mdo na / /
rlung dang bad kan rgyab nas 'dzin / /
de ni zhag gcig gis chod yin / /
nyin bzhi pa'i rims nad tshil dang / /

de yi nus pa bstan pa ni / /

rus rkang gnyis kar zhugs pa yin / /

nyin cig na bar mi byed do / /

yid dang las las skye bar 'gyur / /

de tshe nad ba dbugs drag rdul / /

dran stor rims kyi shugs kyis gzir / /

me drod stobs che stsogs kyis 'tsho / /
'dres las gyur dang gnyer ma ni / /
bar mar gnas pa gang yin pa / /
lo gcig yan chad lon gyur pa / /
de dag gso dka' yin par bshad / /
phyi rol gnyer mar byung ba dang / /
nad gcig shas che las byung dang / /
skyes nas ring po ma lon gang / /
gzhang 'brum de ni gso ba sla / /
pho mtshan stsogs kyi 'og nas ni / /
rang rang skabs bshad lte bar skyes / /
rta bla ba yi kha 'dra zhing / /
'byung bag can la 'jam pa yin / /
khyab byed kyis ni bad kan bsdus / /
pags pa'i phyi rol thor bur byed / /
mdzer pa 'dra zhing rtsub par gnas / /
pags pa'i mdzer pa yin par shes / /
rlung gis zug cing rtsub par 'gyur / /
mkhris pas gnag la dmar rtsar 'gyur / /
bad kan gyis de snum nyid dang / /
rmen bu'i mdog dang 'dra bar 'gyur / /
blo dang ldan pas myur bar ni / /
'bad de gzhang 'brum gso bar byed / /
de yis gzhang ni myur 'gags nas / /
dmu rdzing nad ni skye bar 'gyur / /
yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las /
nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bdun pa'o // //
de nas tshad pas 'khru ba dang pho ba'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o / /
nad gzhi sna re kun dang ni / /
'jigs dang mya ngan las gyur pa'i / /
tshad pas 'khru ba rnam drug yin / /
de ni chu 'thungs drags pa dang / /
sha rid sha skam ma goms pa'i / /
til gyi khu ba ma smin 'bru / /
chang rtsub kha zas tshod ma zin / /
gzhang 'brum snum bag drags pa dang / /
'bu dang shugs ni bkag las 'byung / /
de 'dras rlung ni 'khrugs pa yis / /
chu khams thur du bskyod gyur la / /
de nyid kyis ni me drod nyams / /
de 'og khong pa khyab nas ni / /
bshang ba sla ba nyid du byed / /
de ltar tshad 'khru 'byung bar bshad / /
de yi 'byung 'gyur mtshan ma ni / /
bshang lam snying ga lto bar zug /
lus snyom bshang ba sri ba dang / /
sbo zhing kha zas mi 'ju ba'o / /
de las rlung gyur bshang chur bcas / /
nyung zhig 'byung zhing gzer sgra bcas / /
'gag cing 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / /
rtsub sla dbu bar bcas pa 'am / /
gong bu yang dang yang du 'byung / /
de bzhin bu ram tshig pa 'dra / /
sbyin bag bcas shing bcad snyam sems / /

spu langs pa dang 'khru ba yin / /
mkhris pas ser zhing gnag pa dang / /
sngo zhing du ba'i mdog 'dra la / /
khrag bcas shin tu dri mnam pa / /
skom dad brgyal tsha rdul dang bcas / /
gzer bcas gzhang kha tsha dang bcas / /
gzhang khar thor bu 'byung ba yin / /
bad kan las gyur ska ba dang / /
'byar bag dkar zhing nal nal po / /
snum zhing be'u snabs bad kan bcas / /
rgyun du 'khru zhing lci la mnam / /
ska zhing nad rjes 'brang ba dang / /
gnyid che khong snyom yi ga 'chus / /
nyung zad nyung zad 'khru dang bcas / /
ba spu brtse zhing glong bcas dang / /
chu so lto ba gzhang kha lci / /
bshang yang bshang ba ma btang snyam / /
kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan / /
'jigs pas sems ni 'khrugs gyur pa / /
rlung gis mkhris bcas bshang ba ni / /
sla byed de nas 'khru ba ni / /
tsha zhing sla la 'phyo ba dang / /
mtshan ma rlung mkhris las byung 'dra / /
mya ngan las byung de dang 'dra / /
mdor na tshad 'khru rnam gnyis te / /
ma zhur bcas dang ma zhu med / /
khrag bcas khrag med de las ni / /
dang po bshang gci chur 'bying 'gyur / /
dri mnam lto ni sbo ba dang / /
mkhregs shing mchil snabs shin tu mang / /
smin pa de las bzlog pa yin / /
bad kan smin pa'ang chu nang 'bying / /
gang zhig tshad 'khru 'bad pa ni / /
med des pho ba'i nad du 'gyur / /
me drod nyams par byed pa yi / /
zas bsten pa yis me drod nyams / /
gang zhig zhu nas bshang ba ni / /
be+e'u snabs bcas dang be'u snabs med / /
'khru ba de ni tshad 'khru ste / /
rang bzhin gyis ni myur gsod byed / /
ma zhu kha zas ma zhu dang / /
zhu ba smin pa'ang mi 'khru 'gyur / /
rgyu med yang dang yang sri ba'am / /
rgyu med yang yang sla bar 'byung / /
pho bar ma zhu stsogs shing 'khru / /
yun ring na bar byed pa yin / /
de ni nad sna re re 'dus / /
las byung rnam pa bzhi yin no / /
de yi sngon tshul snyom pa dang / /
ring nas 'ju zhing skyur bag 'byung / /
mchil mang kha yis ro mi tshor / /
rmya snyom skom zhing yi ga 'chus / /
lto sbo slon ni bro ba dang / /
rna ba rgyu ma sgra dang bcas / /
spyi yi mtshan nyid skem pa dang / /
du ba mun dang rims kyis 'debs / /
brgyal zhing mgo na bshang ba 'gags / /
rkang pa lag pa skrangs par 'gyur / /
de la rlung la rkan bskams zhing / /
rab rib rna bar sgra 'byung dang / /
rtsib logs brla dang chu sor na / /
bshang ba yang dang yang du 'byung / /
yang yang sbo zhing gsud pa dang / /
ro rnams kun la brkam pa dang / /
bkres skom rgyu ma bcad snyam sems / /
zas zhu nas ni sbo ba dang / /
zas zos nas ni bde bar 'gyur / /
rlung gi snying nad skran gzhang 'brum / /
mcher pa skya rbab 'byung bar dogs / /
bshang ba 'byung dka' ska slar 'byung / /
de yang be+e snabs sgra can 'byung / /
gzhang na lud pa dbugs mi bde / /
mkhris pa sngo zhing ser ba dang / /

yi ga 'chus shing skom dad che / /

zas slon yi ga 'chus pa dang / /

lud pa snying nad cham pas 'debs / /
snying ga mer mer por sems shing / /

bud med mi dga' me drod chung / /

yan lag char phye gang bshad pa / /
de yang pho ba'i nad du 'gyur / /

de nas gcin 'gags pa'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o / /
lgang pa lgang pa'i mgo pho mtshan / /
rked pa rlig pa gzhang kha ni / /

gcig tu 'brel ba yin par bshad / /

mkhris pa las gyur ser tsha na / /
mdog dmar bad kan las gyur pa / /
lgang pa pho mtshan lci zhing skrangs / /
'byar bag ngal gyis 'byung zhing thogs / /
nad kun las byung mtshan kun ldan / /
gang tshe rlung gis lgang pa'i kha / /

rim gyis bskams par byas pa las / /

ba lang mkhris par gi wang ltar / /

'di yi sngon tshul mtshan nyid ni / /

de byung zin nas bde bar byed / /

'bru mar chang dang gsher ba'i sha //
dar ba bu ram bu ram shing / /

de byung gso bya 'tsho tsam dang / /

de rnams kyi ni spyi'i mtshan nyid / /

bu ram shing khu lta bur mngar / /

zhag lon na ni ska bar 'gyur / /

steng na dngas ma 'og na ska / /

bags kyis 'byung ba'i za khu yin / /

rkang 'dres pa'am rkang nyid ni / /
yang dang yang 'byung rkang za khu / /
glang chen myos ltar rgyun du ni / /

de ni rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur / /

nad kyis bkag pa'i mtshan ma dag /
de ni rgyu med par 'byung zhing / /
skad cig zad stong gang 'gyur ba / /

thams cad dus su ma bcos na / /

gang zhig thams cad mngar 'gyur bas / /
phal cher sbrang rtsi'i za khu yin / /

zas mi 'ju zhing yi ga 'chus / /
slon lud gnyid che cham pas 'debs / /

rlig 'bras bye zhing rims kyis 'debs / /

sgu bo me dbal phra mo dang / /
sran chung 'dra dang nyungs kar 'dra / /
bu bcas 'byung dang pi da ri / /
khong 'bras zhes bya'i 'bras 'brum bcu / /

tshigs dang gnad dang sha che ba'i / /

sku bor 'dug pas sgu bor bshad / /
skyes ma thag tu pags pa tsha / /
shin tu na byed me dbal te / /
dmar zhing gnag la gas pa dang / /

sran chung 'dra ba'i tshad dang dbyibs / /
mnyam pas sran chung can yin no / /

rab phra'i 'brum bus khyab gyur pa'o / /

khong 'bras gzhan du bshad pa yin / /
de la dang po'i 'bras nad gsum / /
bu bcas dang ni bi da ri / /
tshil chen las byung brnag dka' yin / /

tshil chung las byung brnag nus 'gyur / /
de rnams nad shas ji ltar che'i / /
gcin snyi ba yi dbang las 'byung / /
'di dag za khu med par ni / /
gnod gyur tshil las 'byung 'gyur te / /
ji srid dngos po mi snang ba / /
de srid shes par mi 'gyur ro / /
kha dog ljang ba'am dmar ba'i gcin / /
za khu'i sngon tshul med pa yis / /
gcin 'byung gang de za khu min / /
de ni khrag mkhris yin zhes bya / /

bsil bag la dga' gre ba rkan bskams shing / /

gcin nad za khu'i tshogs ni phyis 'byung tshul / /

sbrang rtsi'i ro 'dra ba la gnyis su rtog /
lus brtas bad kan can gyi za khu'am / /
nyes pa zad pas rlung gi bdag can yin / /
sngon tshul bcas pa'i bad mkhris za khu dang / /
gang yang rim gyis rlung nad za khur 'gyur / /
mkhris pa las gyur gang yin gso bar dka' / /
gal te tshil nad chung gyur gso sla / /
yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las /
nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'o // //
de nas khong 'bras dang rgyu rlugs dang skran gyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o / /
kha zas khengs bu rab tsha dang / /
rtsub dang skam dang tsha 'gyur zos / /
nyal ba'i spyod pa mi bde bas / /
khrag nad skyed 'gyur de dang des / /
pags pa sha tshil rus pa dang / /
khrag dang chu ba chu ba che / /
phyi dang nang du skrangs gyur pa / /
rtsa ba che zhing nad tshabs che / /
zlum po'am 'jong bar gnas pa gang / /
khong 'bras de ni rnam pa drug /
nad dmigs sna re 'dus pa dang / /
khrag dang smas pa las byung ba'o / /
'dir phyi'i yan lag de dang der / /
rab na mdud pa 'dra la mtho / /
nang gi shin tu mi bzad cing / /
gting ring skran ltar sra ba yin / /
grog mkhar lta bur mtho ba dang / /
me dang mtshon ltar myur gsod byed / /
lte ba chu so mchin mcher pa / /
glo dang snying lto brla rtsa dang / /
mkhal ma gnyis sam gzhang du'ang 'byung / /
de la rlung gyur nad tshabs drag /
dmar nag ring zhig lon nas ni / /
'byung zhing smin pa dbyibs mi snyoms / /
ran zhing mgo 'khor spos ba dang / /
g.yo zhing 'pho la sgra dang bcas / /
mkhris gyur zangs ltar dmar rtsa gnag /
skom dad tsha rims rmongs bag skyed / /
ldang zhing smin pa myur ba yin / /
bad kan las skya g.ya' dang bcas / /
slon zhing bsil la sla ba dang / /
glal zhing lci la yi ga 'chus / /
'byung zhing smin pa yun ring thogs / /
'dus pa las gyur 'dren ma yin / /
'dir ni phyi nang gnyis mtshan nyid / /
don gyi dbang las shes par bya / /
'brum bu nag pos khebs shing gnag /
rab tsha na zhing rims kyis 'debs / /
mkhris pa'i rtags ldan phyi 'am nang / /
khrag gyur bud med nyid la 'byung / /
mtshon la stsogs pas smas pa yis / /
rma byung mi 'phrod bsten pa las / /
rma kha'i tsha ba rlung gis phul / /
khrag bcas mkhris pa 'byung bar byed / /
khong 'bras bla brnan nad mang zhing / /
khrag mkhris mtshan nyid can dag byed / /
bla brnan de yi dbye ba yang / /
gnas kyi dbye ba las bshad do / /
lte bar byung na skyigs bu ste / /
chu sor gcin 'gags rnag tu 'gyur / /
mcher pa dbugs mi bde mchin par / /
dbugs 'byung 'gag skom mgo 'khor 'gyur / /
glo bar byung na lkog nad 'gyur / /
snying byung yan lag kun gzir snyam / /
rab rmongs mun sros snyam du byed / /
snying 'phar na bar 'gyur ba yin / /
lto ba rtsib logs phrag pa'i bar / /
na zhing lto sbos 'byung bar 'gyur / /
chu so mdoms bar byung brla na / /
mkhal mar byung na rked pa rgyab / /
rtsib logs su ni na bar 'gyur / /
gzhang du rlung ni thur 'byung 'gags / /
zhu dang ma zhu phyed nyid zhu / /
de dag 'or nad lta bur bshad / /
lte ba yan chad smin khar 'dzag / /
lte ba man chad gzhang du 'dzag //
lte bar gnas pa gnyi gar 'dzag /
khong 'bras kyi ni nad dmigs rnams / /
'dzag las rma ltar shes par bya / /
de las 'dus pa las gyur dang / /
snying dang lte ba chu sor gnas / /
phyi 'am nang du bye ba 'am / /
smin te kha nas 'dzag pa ni / /
nyam chung bla brnan ldan pa spang / /
de bzhin bud med bu btsas pa'am / /
sbrum ma'am nu zho yod pa dang / /
nu zho med pa'i nu ma yi / /
rtsa sgo kha byer phyin gyur nas / /
phyi yi khong 'bras mtshan nyid can / /
skrang zhing srab 'byung bar 'gyur / /
bu mo rnams kyi nu rtsa'i sgo / /
phra bas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro / /
rlung ni rgyu lam 'gags pas 'khrugs / /
skrang dang gzer ni skyed cing rgyu / /
chu so rlig par phyin pa dang / /
rlig par rgyu ba'i rtsa dag ni / /
btsir nas rlig pa pags pa dag / /
'phel zhing rlig rlugs nyid du phyed / /
rang khrag gcin tshil rgyu ma las / /
rlig rlugs de ni rnam bdun 'gyur / /
rgyu ma gcin skyes pa'am rlung / /
rgyu ma'i dbye ba 'ba' zhig gzhan / /
rlung gyur rkyal pa gang 'dra zhing / /
reg na rtsub cing rgyu med na / /

bad kan las bsil lci zhing snum / /

mkhris pa'i rlig rlugs mtshan nyid ldan / /
tshil gyur rlig rlugs bad kan 'dra / /
'jam zhing ta la'i 'bras bur mtshungs / /
gcin gnag pa la brten pa rnams / /
gcin las 'bang bar de 'gyur te / /
rkyal pa chu yis gang bltar / /

gcin 'gags pa dang rlig pa yi / /
'og tu skrang par byed par 'gyur / /

shugs bkag bcir dang khur dang lam / /
yan lag log par 'chus pa dang / /

de cha mdud pa ltar glo 'gyur / /

bsten pas lus ni dkrugs byas dang / /

so so'am 'dres pa'am 'khrugs gyur pa'am / /

gong por gyur pas gzugs med kyang / /

dbugs mi bde zhing rna sgra 'bod / /
mgo 'khor ngal bar byed pa yin / /
de ni nad gzhi tha dad 'dus / /
sa zhag zos las rnam lnga 'gyur / /
'di yi sngon tshul snying 'phar zhing / /
pags pa rtsub par gyur pa dang / /
yi ga 'chus shing gcin mdog ser / /
rngul med khong pa'i me drod chung / /
lus rmya ngal bar byed pa yin / /
de la rlung gyur lus na zug /
rtsa sen mig dang bshang gci rnams / /
mdog nag rtsub la 'dar ba dang / /
skrang sbo kha yis ro mi tshor / /
rtug skam rtsib logs klad pa na / /
mkhris las rtsa dang sen mo stsogs / /
ljang sngon rims 'debs mun 'thibs byed / /
skom dang rngul brgyal bsil ba 'dod / /
lus mnam kha nang kha ba dang / /
'khru zhing sgregs pa skyur la tsha / /
bad kan rtsa stsogs dkar ba dang / /
glongs shing kha nang lan tshwa bro / /
ba spu ldang zhing skad 'gags la / /
lud pa lu zhing slon par byed / /
'dus gyur mtshan ma 'dres brnag dka' / /
sa zhag bska bas rlung skyed la / /
tsha bro mkhris pa mngar bad kan / /
dngas ma la sogs gnod 'gyur zhing / /
rtsub pas zas zos rtsub gyur nas / /
zhu bas rtsa sbubs 'gags byas te / /
snga ma bzhin du skya rbab skyed / /
de nas lte ba rkang pa dang / /
kha dang pho mtshan skrang par byed / /
bshang ba srin bu dang bcas 'khru / /
bad kan khrag dang bcas pa 'byung / /
gang zhig skya rbab nad kyis btab / /
de yis mkhris skyed zas zos pas / /
khong pa yan lag gnas mkhris gnas / /
bshang khrag bsregs te mig ser skyed / /
des ni mig dang pags pa gdong / /
bshang gci sen mo kha dog ser / /
lus tsha skom dang zas mi 'ju / /
sbal 'dra dbang po nyam chung 'gyur / /
de ni mkhris pa'i shas chen / /
skya rbab nad med par de 'byung / /
yal bar bor na cher skrangs te / /
gso dka' mig ser 'or thabs yin / /
ha li sa ni ljang nag ser / /
rlung mkhris mgo 'khor skom dad che / /
bud med la dga' rims chung 'debs / /
khong rmya me drod nyams stobs 'bri / /
ha li sa ka khrag ngan 'gyur / /
chu ser can zhes bya ba yin / /
de rnams kyi ni bla brnan sngar / /
'or nad gtso bo yin par bshad / /
de phyir de nyid bshad par bya'o / /
rlung 'khrugs gyur pas bad kan dang / /
khrag dang mkhris pa phyi rol rtsar / /
'phros byas de yang rgyun srang 'gags / /
pags pa sha la gnas gyur te / /
'or nad mthong zhing skrang par byed / /
de bas thams cad 'dus gyur bshad / /
rgyu rnams kyi ni bye brag las / /
gzugs dbye dgu yi bdag nyid can / /
nad gzhi tha dad gnyis dang kun / /
snad dang dug gis phog las 'byung / /
yang na rang dang glo bur gnyis / /
yan lag kun skrang phyogs gcig gnyis / /
khyab dang mtho dang mdud pa yi / /
dbyibs kyi dbye bas gsum du 'dod / /
'or nad kyi ni spyi yi rgyu / /
nad las skyes pa khyad par nyid / /
nad las smyung stsogs kyis nyam chung / /
myur du lhag par zos las 'byung / /
de nas gzhan yang lci ba dang / /
skyur dang snum bsil lan tshwa dang / /
thal sman rnon po tsha ba dang / /
mya ngan chu gnyid drags dang yar / /
sa zos sha lci sha skam dang / /
ma zhu ngal dang bud med drags / /
rkang gis lam du 'gro ba 'am / /
bzhon pas drag tu bskyod 'gyur yin / /
lud pa dbugs mi bde tshad 'khru / /
gzhang 'brum lto ba'i nad dang ni / /
mngal nas khrag zag rims kyis btab / /
gsud dang chu ser slon nyes dang / /
sbrum ma dang ni me dbal gyi / /
nad dang skya rbab dag gis btab / /
gzhan yang log par gsos gyur pa'i / /
nad de brang du gnas na ni / /
stod skrang chu sor gnas smad skrang / /
dbus na gnas pa rab tu skrang / /
yan lag kun khyab thams cad skrang / /
nying lag la brten de skrang byed / /
de yi sngon tshul rtsa rnams tsha / /
yan lag snyom par byed pa yin / /
rlung las skrang pa 'pho zhang rtsub / /
spu rtsub smug cing gnag pa dang / /
pags 'khums 'dar brtse reg nan / /
na zhing zug pa be+em bem po / /
myur bar ldang zhing myur du zhi / /
skrangs pa mnan na dma' bar 'gyur / /
snum dang dro pas mnyes na zhi / /
mtshan mo chung zhing nyin mo che / /
pags pa yungs kar lde gu yis / /
bskus ltar tsha ba tsag tsag byed / /
mkhris pa rtsa ser dmar la gnag /
spu ni dmar ser gyur pa dang / /
myur du ldang dang zhi mi 'gyur / /
dang por dbus su byung dang srab / /
skom bcas tsha zhing rims 'debs rngul / /
mnam zhing 'drul la snum mgo 'khor / /
bsil bar 'dod cing thur du 'khru / /
dri mnam reg na mi bzod 'jam / /
bad kan g.ya' spu pags pa dkar / /
mkhrang zhing bsil la lci ba dang / /
snum zhing 'jam la brten zhing 'thas / /
gnyid che slon zhing me drod nyams / /
mnan na mi 'bying ldang dka' zhing / /
zhi dka' mtshan mo skrangs tshabs che / /
'od ma gtsags bu stsogs dral yang / /
khrag mi 'byung bar spyin bag 'dzag /
dro dang reg pa la mngon dga' / /
gnyis 'byung gsum po rang ji bzhin / /
rgyu dang mtshan ma 'dren ma yin / /
'dus pa kun gyi bdag nyid can / /
mtshon las stsogs pas nad gyur zhing / /
bcad dam dbral lam smas la stsogs / /
kha ba me dang rgya mtsho'i rlung / /
bse rtsi ka pi ka chu yi / /
khu ba gra ma stsogs reg pas / /
skrang pa mched par 'gyur ba yin / /
shin tu tsha zhing dmar bar snang / /
phal cher mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid can / /
dug skyes srog chags dug can ni / /
lus la sod dang gcin gyis phog /
srog chags dug med pa yi yang / /
so dang mche ba sen mos zug /
gcin rtug khu bas smos pa dang / /
dri ma can gyi gos kyis reg /
dug shing rlung la rag pa dang /
dbyig dug phye mas reg las byung / /
mnyen zhing g.yo la 'phyang ba dang / /
myur gsod tsha zhing na bar byed / /
'or nad gsar byung bla brnan med / /
gso sla gso dka' sngar bshad zin / /
me dpal nad dang snad pa'i bar / /
gnod pa 'or nad mtshungs pa yin / /
de ni phyi nang gnyi ga ste / /
gsum na gnas pa yin par bshad / /
phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka' / /
de la nad ni ji bzhin du / /
'khrugs pa'i rgyu yis ldang gyur la / /
khyad par du ni tsha ba yis / /
lus la myur du mched par byed / /
de yang nang gnas nang du mched / /
phyir gnas phyir mched gnyi gar gnas / /
gnyi gar mched par byed pa yin / /
de la nang na gnas pa ni / /
gnad rnams tsha gdung myos par byed / /
bu ga rnams la gnod pa dang / /
skom dad rab che gcin nad stsogs / /
mi snyoms par ni 'byung ba dang / /
me drod myur nyams las shes bya / /
phyi rol de las bzlog pa yin / /
de la rlung gyur me dbal ni / /
rlung gi rims dang nad thabs 'dra / /
skrang zhing 'gul la zug pa dang / /
yan lag snyom zhing ba spu brtse / /
mkhris gyur myur du mched cing 'gro / /
mkhris rims rtags ldan shin tu dmar / /
bad kan las g.ya' reg na 'jam / /
bad kan las byung rims 'dar na / /
me dbal stsogs kun yal bar bor / /
rang gi nad tshul bsags gyur na / /
de ni smin rdol rang rang gi / /
me dbal rma yi mtshan nyid 'dzin / /
rlung mkhris la ni rims 'debs slon / /
brgyal zhing tshad 'khru skom mgo 'khor / /
rus tshigs chag snyam me drod nyams / /
mun zhugs snyam sems yi ga 'chus / /
yan lag thams cad me mdag ni / /
'bar pas khyab pa lta bur tsha / /
phyogs ni gang dang gang du mched / /
khyab pas yan lag de dang de / /
me mdag zhi ba ltar gnag pa'am / /
sngo ba'am dmar bas khyab byed la / /
mes bsregs lta bur chu bur 'byung / /
myur du mched cing khyab par byed / /
gnad kyi rjes 'jug me dbal ni / /
de nas stobs rab skyes pa'i rlung / /
yan lag na zhing dran pa stor / /
gnyid yar dbugs kyi rngam pa drag /
skyigs bus 'debs shing 'di lta bu'i / /
gnas skabs des ni thob par 'gyur / /
sa dang mal khri stan stsogs la / /
gang du 'ang bde ba mi 'thob cing / /
'gre zhing sdug bsngal myong ba dang / /
lus sems ngal las byung ba yis / /
gnyid kyi rmongs bag sad dga' ba / /
de ni me 'dra'i me dpal yin / /
bad kan gyis ni bkag pa'i rlung / /
bad kan de rdol mang du phye / /
khrag 'phel ba yis khrag brtol te / /
pags pa chu bshal gnas / /
gnod byas thor bu phra zhing rim / /
zlum zhing sbom la sra ba yi / /
mdzer pa'i phreng ba chags byed cing / /
mdog dmar rab na rims kyis 'debs / /
lud pa dbugs mi bde tshad 'khru / /
kha skam skyigs bu slon mgo 'khor / /
rmongs bag mdog nyams brgyal dang lus / /
yan lag na zhing me drod nyams / /
de ltar mdzer pa'i me dbal ni / /
bad kan rlung 'khrugs las gyur yin / /
bad kan mkhris las rims 'debs rengs / /
gnyid che slon bag klad pa na / /
yan lag na zhing bya rmyang 'dod / /
bla zhing mgo 'khor yi ga 'chus / /
rtsub cing drod nyams rus chag snyam / /
skom zhing dbang po mi gsal lci / /
be snabs 'khru zhing dang ga 'khyil / /
de ni rtsa sbubs rnams su 'gro / /
phal cher ma zhu gnas na zhugs / /
phyogs gcig tu ni rab min / /
thor bu ser po dmar po dang / /
dkar pos phyogs kun gang bar byed / /
nor bu ltar snang gnag cing snum / /
dri ma can la skrang zhing lci / /
rnag pa'i zabs che rab tu tsha / /
reg na 'jig cing rnag pa dang / /
'dam ltar sha ni zhig gyur cing / /
rtsa rgyus gsal bar snang ba yin / /
mi yi ro ltar mnam me dpal / /
de ni 'dam 'dra zhes byar bshad / /
kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan / /
lus zungs kun la rab khyab byed / /
phyi yi rgyu yi smas las 'khrugs / /
khrag bcas mkhris pa skyed byed de / /
me dpal du ni rlung gis byed / /
rgya sran ku lang+tha 'dra ba'i / /
'brum bus khyab skrang rims 'debs na / /
shin tu tsha la dmar zhing sngo / /
nad dmigs tha dad las gyur gsum / /
gnyis gyur bla brnan med gso sla / /
rma dang 'dus pa las 'byung dang / /
thams cad gnad ni khyab pa dang / /
rtsa dang chu ba sha 'drul dang / /
mi ro'i dri 'dra rul gso dka' / /
yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las /
nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gsum pa'o // //
de nas mdze nad dang sha bkra dang gzi gu dang srin bu'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o / /
kha zas spyod lam log pa dang / /
khyad par du ni mi 'phrod bsten / /
dam pa smod dang srog gcod dang / /
gzhan gyi nor 'phrog stsogs bsten dang / /
sdig pa'i las ni 'phral byas dang / /
sngon chad byas pas nad bslangs nas / /
rtsa la thad kar gram nas ni / /
sha dang pags pa chu ser khrag / /
gnod byas sla bar gyur nas ni / /
de nas phyir ni 'byung 'gyur te / /
pags pa'i mdog ni mi sdug byed / /
mi bzad de ni mdze ru bshad / /
gang phyir dus las yal bar bor / /
de ni lus kun ma rungs 'gyur / /
lus zungs la zhugs nang du khyab / /
thams cad 'drul bar byed par 'gyur / /
rngul bcas rul zhing mnam pa dang / /
srin bu phra mo mi bzad skyed / /
spu lpags chu ba rtsa chen dang / /
rus pa snyi ba rim bzhin za / /
de bas sha bkra phyi rol te / /
mdze las gzhan ni yin par bshad / /
nad gzhi tha dad 'dres pa dang / /
'dus gyur mdze nad rnam pa bdun / /
kun kyang nyes gsum las byung yang / /
de las lhag pa las ming 'dogs / /
rlung gi mdze ni thod pa 'dra / /
mkhris gyur u dum+bA ra ste / /
bad kan las gyur zlum glang shu / /
rlung mkhris las skyes ri sh+ya'i lce / /
bad rlung las byung pags pa gcig / /
'brum phran dang ni sha bkra dang / /
'bras byer chu ser zhig po'o / /
bad kan mkhris pa las byung ba / /
shu ba rma kha brgya pa dang / /
pad+ma dkar po 'brum bur bcas / /
g.yan pa pags pa myags pa'o / /
'dus pa las gyur 'ol ma se / /
dang po'i gsum dang shu ba dang / /
'ol ma se dang pad+ma dkar / /
ri sh+ya'i lce zhes bya ba ste / /
'di bdun mdze nad chen po yin / /
mdze nad sngar byung mtshan ma ni / /
shin tu 'jam pa'am reg na rtsub / /
rngul 'byung mi 'byung mdog mi sdug /
lus tsha g.ya' zhing pags tshor med / /
thor bu phra'u mtho ba dang / /
rma ni lhag par gzer ba dang / /
myur du 'byung zhing ring du gnas / /
'tshobs pa dag kyang rtsub par 'gyur / /
rgyu chung gis kyang nad cher ldang / /
ba sbu brtse zhing khrag mdog gnag /
thod pa lta bu gnag cing smug /
rtsub sra tshor ba chung la srab / /
khyab cing mtha' ma mi mnyam la / /
ba spu langs pas khyab par byed / /
shin tu zug cing g.ya' ba chung / /
myur du khyab byed thod pa 'dra / /
u dum+bA ra smin pa ltar / /
pags spu smug rtsa dkar bas khyab / /
shas cher mthug dang shas cher 'drul / /
tsha ba'i nad dang khrag shas cher / /
myur du smin cing 'drul bar byed / /
'bu can u dum+bA ra yin / /
brtan zhing 'thas la lci zhing 'jam / /
dkar dmar myur du mi mched la / /
phan tshun 'dab 'brel shu ba slon / /
g.ya' zhing rnag che 'bus gang la / /
mtha' ma 'jam zhing ser por snang / /
gor gor por gnas zlum po yin / /
g.ya' zhing phra tsag gnag pa dang / /
chu ser mang ba glang shu yin / /
rtsub cing srab la mtha' ma dmar / /
nang na gnag cing mtho ba dang / /
zug cing tsha la na zhing rnags / /
'brum bu rtsub pos khyab pa dang / /
ri sh+ya'i lce ni dbyibs 'dra pa / /
'bu mang ri sh+ya'i lce 'drar bshad / /
glang po'i lpags 'dra reg rtsub lpags / /
gcig pur bshad la gzhi che ba / /
rngul mi 'byung zhing nya lpags 'dra / /
'brum bu phra mo thug thug po / /
reg na rtsub dang ldan pa dang / /
g.ya' zhing sra la gnag pa yin / /
sha bkra nang rtsub phyi rol 'jam / /
phrugs na glog pa 'byung ba dang / /
reg na 'jam zhing srab pa la / /
ku ba'i me tog ltar dmar dkar / /
phal cher ro stod dag tu 'byung / /
rmen bu dmar po g.ya' dang ldan / /
khyab par byed pa'i 'bras zhes bya / /
rkang pa lag pa gas pa dang / /
mi bzad na zhing g.ya' tshabs chung / /
rkang lag zhig pa zhes bya'o / /
thor bu dmar pos khyab pa dang / /
ring du mched cing dUr ba 'dra / /
pags pa zar ma'i me tog 'dra / /
g.ya' zhing brtan par gnas pa dang / /
zlum por byung ba shu ba yin / /
rtsa ba sbom zhing tsha bcas na / /
dmar zhing smug la rma kha mang / /
rnag cing 'bu mang kha brgya pa / /
phal cher kun tu skye ba yin / /
mtha' ma dmar zhing dbus na dkar / /
g.ya' tsha na dang bcas pa dang / /
mtho zhing ri mo brtan pas khyab / /
pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar rgyas shing / /
stug cing chu ser khrag mang la / /
phal cher myur rdol pad dkar yin / /
pags pa srab pa'i 'brum bu dkar / /
dmar bas gang ba 'brum bu yin / /
g.ya' ba'i nad ni g.ya' ba dang / /
'drul zhing lhag par na ba dang / /
'brum pa phra nag mang po ni / /
phal cher rkub lag gru mor 'byung / /
thor bu bcas shing reg mi bzod / /
g.ya' zhing dro tsha na dang bcas / /
dmar la pags pa myags pa yin / /
'ol ma se ni rab tsha na / /
stod ni dmar zhing gnag pa ste / /
'ol ma se yi 'bras bu 'dra / /
mdze yi mtshan ma kun dang ldan / /
de bas kha dog du mar 'gyur / /
mdze nad nad gzhi shas che ba / /
nad dbye shes las bshad pa yi / /
mtshan ma las kyis bstan pa yi / /
nad kun rgyas pa las byung dang / /
gang yang 'chi ltas las bshad dang / /
rus rkang khu chu la gnas spang / /
tshil la gnas pa 'tsho ba tsam / /
mkhris 'dres sha khrag gnas gso dka' / /
rlung dang bad kan las gyur dang / /
pags gnas nad gcig gyur gso sla / /
de la pags par gnas pa'i mdze / /
zug cing rtsub la mdog mi sdug /
khrag gnas rngul 'byung gnyid che skrang / /
sha la gnas pa rkang pa dang / /
lag par 'brum bu 'byung ba dang / /
tshigs gnas lhag par tshigs 'drul skem / /
rkang pa 'jas 'gyur tshil gnas pa / /
yan lag zhig par byed par 'gyur / /
rus pa rkang gnas sna zhom zhing / /
mig dmar skad ni 'gags pa dang / /
rma la 'bu zhugs khu bar gnas / /
bu dang chung mar bcas la 'byung / /
khrag stsogs la ni rim bzhin du / /
mtshan ma thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur / /
gzi gu mdze dang gcig las 'byung / /
de ni sha bkra chu dang ni / /
yongs su 'dzag pa zhes byar bshad / /
nad gzhi gsum la brten zhing 'byung / /
rlung las rtsub cing smug pa yin / /
mkhris gyur pad+ma'i 'dab ltar dmar / /
tsha zhing ba spu 'byi bar byed / /
bad kan las skya stug cing lci / /
g.ya' bcas rim bzhin khrag dang ni / /
sha dang tshil la brten par bshad / /
'di dag mdog ni gnyi ga yin / /
de ni phyi ma bzhin gso dka' / /
spu dkar ma yin srab pa dang / /
phan tshun ma 'dres gsar du byung / /
mes ma bsregs pa gso bar sla / /
de las gzhan pa gso dka' yin / /
mdoms dang lag mthil mchur byung ba / /
gsar du byung yang gso bar dka' / /
nad rnams phal cher zas dang ni / /
mal gcig reg stsogs la brten las / /
thams cad 'go ste mig nad dang / /
mdze nad lhag par 'gos pa yin / /
sha bkra gzi gu'i nad bshad nas / /
da ni srin bu'i nad bshad bya / /
phyi dang nang gi dbye ba yis / /
srin bu rnam pa gnyis su bshad / /
phyi yi dri mas bad kan khrag /
bshang skyes dbye bas rnam bzhi yin / /
ming las rnam pa nyi shur 'gyur / /
de la phyi yi khrag las byung / /
tshad dbyibs mdog ni til 'bru 'dra / /
skra dang gos la brten pa yin / /
phra zhing rkang pa mang la ming / /
shig dang sro ma zhes bya'o / /
gnyi gas thor bu 'brum bu dang / /
g.yan pa dag ni skyed par 'gyur / /
nang gi mdze dang rgyu gcig ste / /
de las bad kan las mang skye / /
zas mngar bu ram 'o ma dang / /
tsha dang 'bras sar chan la dga' / /
mi gtsang byung bcas bshang lam nas / /
lo ma 'dab ma la stsogs dga' / /
bad kan ma zhu'i gnas su 'byung / /
skyes nas kun du 'gro ba yin / /
la la 'breng ba 'dra ba yin / /
la la srin bu khol ma 'dra / /
kha cig myu gu 'bus pa 'dra / /
phra zhing ring la chung ba dang / /
dkar zhing dmar bar snang ba yin / /
de yi ming ni rnam bdun te / /
rgyu ma zad dang lto nang 'khyil / /
snying za ya mtshan chen po dang / /
mi mngon rgyu dang 'jag ma 'dra / /
dri zhim zhes bya de rnams ni / /
snying 'phar kha chu 'dzag pa dang / /
zas mi 'ju zhing yi ga 'chas / /
brgyal zhing mi dran rims 'debs slon / /
skom zhing sbrid pa cham pas 'debs / /
khrag rgyu ba yi rtsa nang nas / /
khrag las byung ba'i srin bu phra / /
zlum zhing rkang med zangs ltar dmar / /
phra zhing la lar bltar mi snang / /
skra rtsa za zhing sbu 'byi byed / /
sbu gling u dum+bA ra 'dra / /
zhags pa bcas dang thong ka ste / /
drug po de dag mdze las gcig /
zhu ba'i gnas su mi gtsang skyes / /
'phel nas thur du rgyu bar byed / /
de ni cher 'phel gyur pa na / /
gang tshe ma zhu'i gnas su zhugs / /
de tshe sgregs pa dbugs 'byung ba / /
phyi sa lta bur mnam par 'gyur / /
zlum zhing lus phra sbom po dang / /
smug dang ser dang dkar dang gnag /
srin bu de ming rnam lnga ste / /
kham gyi zas dang dal gyis 'gro / /
myong bar byed dang brkam pa dang / /
lus la gnod byed ces bya'o / /

yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las / /

de nas rlung nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o / /
rlung ni phan dang gnod byed la / /
'di ni sna tshogs rgyu gcig pu / /
khyad par du ni lus kyi ni / /
nad dang nad med rgyu gcig pu / /

mar dang til mar pi pi ling / /

lde gu bcud len 'di zos na / /

snum gyi 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya / /

bil ba tsan+dan ba le ka /
dbyi mo gla sgang bong nga dkar / /
ba ta ya bak+Sha ra mchog /

sha yis skyed pa'i sha yin phyir / /

snum dang mnan chang chang rnying dang / /
sman khu phye ma 'phrod pa zos / /
lus la legs par sbyar ba yis / /
stobs dang me drod 'phel bar byed / /
dper na me ni shing sra bas / /

de bzhin khong par gnas pa'i me / /

khu ba shu dag pi pi ling / /
po son cha yi phye mar bcas / /
sbrang rtsi til mar rgyam tshar bcas / /
'di ni shing rta can zhes bya / /
de bskol shu dag shu ti dang / /
shing kun rgyam tsha thang shing dang / /
ra sna sbrang rtsi sbyar ba yi / /
'jam rtsi nad sel zhes bya dge /
rtsa ba lnga yi khu ba dang / /
pi pi ling dang rgyam tsha dang / /
shing mngar sbrang rtsir bcas pa yi / /
til mar grub pa'i 'jam rtsir bshad / /
rtsa ba bcu pa 'bras bu gsum / /
po son cha ni bil bar bskol / /
ba gcin dang ni de btags shing / /
pa ta gla sgang dug mo nyung / /
lan tshwa po son cha til mar / /
thal sman lan tshwar bcas pa ni / /
rigs pa'i 'jam rtsi bad kan nad / /
skya rbab gsud pa'i nad rnams dang / /
khu ba rlung ni 'gags pa dang / /
rlung 'khrugs pa la bsngags pa yin / /
gla sgang pa ta e raN+Da / /
sle tres ba la ba spru ba / /
ra sna btsod dang dong ga dang / /
pu shel tse dang kyi lce ba / /
ba ru ra dang pu tse shel / /
rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu rnams / /
srang re po son cha rdog brgyad / /
de ni chu bre bzhi nang bskol / /
bzhi cha lus pa btsags nas ni / /
'o ma bre do dang bsres la / /
'o ma lus pa slar yang bskol / /
skam sa'i sha khu bzhi cha dang / /
sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha shing mngar dang / /
shu ti dur byid pi pi ling / /
dug mo nyung dang skyer khaN+Da / /
btags pa dang ni bsres pa yi / /
'jam rtsi dro 'jam btang na ni / /
sha dang me drod lus kyi stobs / /
khu ba 'phel bar byed pa yin / /
dreg nad rmongs bag gcin snyi dang / /
gzhang 'brum skran dang bshang gci 'gags / /
mi bzad rims dang me dbal dang / /
rgyu rlugs lto sbos 'khrug cing 'khru / /
chu so rked pa brla dku na / /
gnye'u rengs rna ba mgo bo'i nad / /
zla mtshan nad dang smyo byed dang / /
'or nad lud pa rde'u chags dang / /
gcin 'khyil ba yi nad rnams 'joms / /
dbang po nyams shing zhum pa dang / /
mig la phan zhing bu skyed byed / /
'tsho byed rgyal po bcud len yin / /
ri dwags phra mo mgo chung ba / /
rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'i chu / /
spa ma'i 'bras bu shu ti dang / /
gla sgang lde gu snum chen bcas / /
mas gtong rlung ni sel ba'i mchog /
shin tu ro tsar byed pa yin / /
rma bya'i gshog pa mkhris pa dang / /
rgyu ma rkang pa mchu rtug pa / /
por ba'i sha ni 'ba' zhig dang / /
rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu ni / /
srang re dang ni ldan gyur pa / /
chu dang 'o mar bskol nas ni / /
'o ma lus par sbrang rtsi mar / /
bcas dang de bzhin bi da ri / /
shing mngar shu ti pi pi ling / /
po son cha yi lde gur bsres / /
rgyam tsha cung zad btab pa yi / /
'jam rtsi stobs 'phel ro tsa'i mchog /
gong ma sreg la sogs pa yang / /
cho ga 'di ni so sor bya / /
khron gyis gzas tshol thams cad dang / /
mthu rtsal mchu yis zas tshol ba / /
chu la gnas pa'ang de bzhin te / /
nya la 'o ma spang bar bya / /
sram dang ne+e'u le byi la dang / /
reg 'jam byi ba rnams kyi sha /
re re srang bcu rtsa ba lnga / /
'o ma'i nang du bskol nas ni / /
'o ma der ni po son cha / /
pi pi ling dang lan tshwa gnyis / /
kha ra til mar sbrang rtsi mar / /
'jam rtsi btang na bcud len mchog /
rtsol bas dkrugs glo 'grams pa dang / /
dbang po nyams dang gzi mdangs stobs / /
khu chu bshang gci 'gags pa dang / /
dreg nad kyis 'theng nad rnams dang / /
rta dang glang po shing rtas g.yeng / /
rkang lag chag grugs gyur pa la / /
slar ni bde bar 'tsho byed cing / /
ro tsa byed pa'i mchog yin no / /
kha sral bu ram shing phran las / /
g.yos su byas pa'i 'o thug blud / /
snum zhing bsdams pa mi dgos pa'i / /
grub pa'i sman ni sbyar bar bya / /
nad 'joms srung dang bcas pa yi / /
snum gyi 'jam rtsi bshad bya ste / /
rtsa ba bcu pa ba la dang / /
ra sna a shwa gan+d+ha dang / /
ba spru ba dang e raN dang / /
sle tres ga bra'i rtsa ba dang / /
ba sha ka dang bu ti ka /
sa ha ra dza nye shing ba / /
ka ka na se srang re dang / /
nas dang ma sha zar ma dang / /
rgya shug rgya sran khyor re'i tshad / /
chu bre drug cu rtsa bzhir bskol / /
de las bre ni bcu drug lus / /
'tsho byed sde ni srang re bcug /
til mar bre ni bzhi dang bskol / /
'di ni 'jam rtsir btang gyur na / /
rlung nad thams cad sel bar byed / /
de bzhin skam sa'i srog chags sha /
'tsho byed sde dang bcas par bskol / /
shu ti nas dang bil ba skyur / /
til mar bskol bas rlung nad sel / /
rgyam tsha mdog dmar gyur gyi bar / /
mer bsregs mar gsur rlung nad 'joms / /
dzi ban ti dang po son cha / /
me da rnam gnyis sra ba ni / /
shing mngar ba la shu ti dang / /
zangs rtsi ba dang pi pi ling / /
ka ka ni sa nye shing ba / /
kha sral k+Shi ra ka ka ri / /
zur pa karka ta sring gi /
shu dag btags pa'i lde gu dang / /
til mar mar dang 'o ma ni / /
bzhi 'gyur gyi ni nang du bskol / /
'jam rtsi nyams brtas rlung nad 'joms / /
stobs dang khu ba me drod 'phel / /
khrag dang khu ba'i nad sel byed / /
bu skyed par yang byed pa yin / /
rgyam tsha ru rta po son cha / /
shu ti lcang ma shu dag dang / /
ba le ka dang shing mngar dang / /
ga bra'i rtsa ba kad pha la / /
thang shing dong gra ma nu dang / /

e raN+Da yi mar ram ni / /
til mar bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi yis / /
bad kan nad 'joms rgyu rlugs dang / /
rtug skam skran dang gzhang 'brum dang / /
mcher pa'i nad dang gcin snyi dang / /
rlung 'khyil ba dang lto sbos dang / /
rde chags nad ni myur du sel / /
yang na bil ba la sogs pa'i / /
rtsa ba lnga pa til mar bskol / /
yang na bad kan sel sman sbyar / /
til mar dang btang bad kan 'joms / /
yang na po son cha brgyad 'gyur / /
skyur bskol 'jam rtsis bad kan sel / /
'jam rtsi 'jam pas rmongs gyur la / /
rnon po nye bar sbyang bar bya / /
rno bas gnod la snum pa dang / /
mngar zhing bsil ba 'jam pa gtang / /
rnon po ba gcin pi lu dang / /
tsi tra ka dang lan tshwa dang / /
thal sman dang ni nyungs kar rnams / /
dus la bab par gtang bar bya / /
'o ma mar stsogs 'jam po yis / /
nyams stobs dus dang nad gzhi rang bzhin dag /
rnam par phye ste 'jam rtsi gtang bya ba / /
rang rang gi ni sman gyi sde tshan gyis / /
rang rang gi ni nang rnams bsal bar bya / /
tsha bas nyam thag la bsil ba / /
bsil bas nyen la dro 'jam sbyar / /
de dang 'tsham pa'i sman ldan par / /
'jam rtsi brtags te gtang bar bya / /
sbyang bar bya ba'i nad rnams la / /
rtas byed 'jam rtsi mi gtang zhing / /
mi gang mdze gcin nad kyis nyen / /
tshil rgyas nad la gtang mi bya / /
nyam chung glo 'grams pa dang brgyal ba dang / /
lus skem rid dang sbyangs pa'i lus can dang / /
gang yang dri mas tshe 'di gzung 'gyur la / /
sbyong bar byed pa'i mas gtong gtang mi bya / /
yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las / /
cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o // //
de nas sman mas gtong ba'i cho gas nad phyin te sos par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o / /
snum chos dugs ni ma byas dang / /
lto lci ba la sman grang snum / /
tsha nyung sman tshad chung ba'am / /
sman ni ska ba btang gyur na / /
de yis nad ni bslangs gyur dang / /
stobs chung ba yi nad ma phyin / /
sbyor ba nyes pa skyed 'gyur zhing / /
'phyen dang phyi sa gcin sri dang / /
lte ba chu so na zhing tsha / /
dang gar chags shing gzhang skrangs dang / /
g.yan pa'i thor bu mdog mi sdug /
mi dga' me drod chung bar 'gyur / /
tshad 'khru'i nyes pa bar ma la / /
sngar bshad sman gyi khu ba gnyis / /
de las gcig ni dro ba yi / /
btung ba blugs pa bsngags pa yin / /

nad gzhi shas che lus rtsub dang / /
lto sra nus pa chung btang na / /

rlung gi lam ni 'gag par byed / /

lto sbos nad rnams gzir bar byed / /
gzhang dang lto ba tsha ba dang / /
rlig pa chu so na byed cing / /
snying gar 'gags pas gzer ba dang / /
phan tshun du ni 'gro bar byed / /
de la lus bsku dugs byas pa'i / /
lus la reng bu gzhug par bya / /
bil ba stsogs sam bi lu dang / /
nyungs kar ba gcin bcas mas ga tong / /
tsi tra thang shing til mar ni / /
bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya / /
shugs ni bkag par gyur pa'am / /
btsir drags par ni byas pa'am / /
lan tshwa snum shas chung la tsha / /
sman chung ba yis mas gtong ba / /
'jam pas rlung gis gyen du 'phul / /
kha dang sna nas 'byung bar 'gyur / /
de yis brgyal dang snying nad dang / /
skom dang tsha ba la sogs 'byung / /
brgyal ba'i nad ni mthong gyur na / /
de yi gdod la chu grang gtor / /
ngal bsos bar du g.yab pa dang / /
dbugs rngub 'byung ba byed du gzhug /
kha sbubs bzhag ste rgyab rtsib logs / /
lto ba lag pa dron pos mnye / /
skra nas bteg ste sprugs pa dang / /
sbrul dang mche ba can 'jigs bstan / /
mtshon dang thog bab rgyal po'i mis / /
skrag bcas mas gtong thur du 'byung / /
lag pa gos kyis mgul par bsdam / /

srog dang gyen rgyu rlung bkag pas / /
thur sel shin tu bder rgyu ba / /
grub pa yis ni mas gtong ba / /

sle tres smyug ma'i lo ma dang / /
pu ti ka rany+dza'i shun pa / /

puti ka ni ba gcin bskol / /

ska ches dugs ni drags pa dang / /

de ni chu srang gsum gyi tshad / /

bre phyed chu bskol bzhi cha lus / /

'jam tshos 'byar bag 'byar la rtsub / /

yang dang yang du rnag 'dzag cing / /
sha lpags 'drul bas mchi mar bcas / /
rnag sla 'dzag pa rma phra zhing / /
skrangs shing g.yo ba che ba dang / /
mig phugs mtshams skrangs rnag 'dzag cing / /
nad bcas rnag gi chu ser 'dzag /
mig phugs kyi ni mtshams nang na / /
skrangs zug tsha bcas chu ser nad / /
mig zur ram ni mig phugs su / /
g.ya' zhing rdzi ma'i bu ga nas / /
rnag 'dzag srin dang rmen bu 'byung / /
na bcas srin gyi rmen bu can / /
bcings pa lta bu'i srin rmen bu / /
rnag gi chu ser tshigs can dag /
mtshon gyis gso bya lhag ma lnga / /
'dzag pa chu ser bcas pa spangs / /
mkhris pas dkar po'i thig le ni / /
nag pa'am sngo ba'am ser po skyed / /
gur gum me long dri mas gos / /
ltar snang na dang tsha ba med / /
'khru zhing skom dad rims dang bcas / /
nad gzhi nya phyis can zhes bya / /
bad kan las dkar sha lhag dkar / /
ring nas 'phel ba mig mdzer dkar / /
nad med pa la skrangs pa dang / /

bad kan mdud pa zhes byar bshad / /
thig le 'bras phye ltar dkar ba / /

tsha zhing na dang bcas pa dang / /
skrangs shing mchi mas gos pa med / /
khrag gyur rtsa yi nges par bshad / /
rtsa'i nyes yal bar bor na ni / /
dmar ris de nyid 'phel bar 'gyur / /
khrag bcas rtsa ni brtse bar byed / /
de yis mig gis blta mi nus / /
rtsa yi dra bas g.yogs shing stug /

pad+ma 'dra ba sha lhag yin / /

lan tshwa lnga ni bskol ba'am / /
bi da ri sogs sde bskol blud / /
dugs dang sna sman la sogs bya / /
gzhogs byed nar bshad gso ba'ang bya / /
khrag mkhris las gyur thug pa ni / /
mar sar mngar ba'i sman bskol blud / /
sman chu blugs shing byug pa dang / /
nus bsil grang mo dag gis bya / /
da ba'i shun pa 'bras bu gsum / /
shi ri par+Ni pri yad+ku / /
shing mngar seng phrom til mar gyi / /
bcu 'gyur 'o ma skyer bar bcas / /
bskol ba'i sna sman gtang bar bya / /
bad kan las gyur smyung ba dang / /
yungs kar lde gus mgo bsku'am / /
thal sman bcas pa'i mar blud de / /
slon gzhug rgyam tsha tsha ba gsum / /
byi dong ga dang dug mo nyung / /
zi ra ra gcin sbyar ba yi / /
sna sman dag ni gtong bar bya / /
'dus gyur tsha dang rno sbyar ba'i / /
mar gyi sna sman blugs pas gso / /
gcong chen srin gso'i rim gyis ni / /
cham pa ma rung 'tsho tsam bya / /
tsha ba gsum dang e raN+Da / /
thang shing ru rta byi dong ga /
bong nga dkar po ing gu dang / /
dur byid par ta ka'i sa bon / /
nyungs kar nye'u 'phral rus pa dang / /
ag+hi man+d+ra'i me tog dang / /
pi lu shi kru'i sa bon dang / /
rta sbangs khu ba gcin dang ni / /
glang po'i gcin dang gcig tu sbyar / /
zar ma'i skud dkris reng bu yi / /
dud pa kha dang sna nas brngub / /
smin dang sbrid pa 'byung zhes pa / /
sna sman rnon po bud pas phan / /
bca' sga ru rta pi pi ling / /
rgun 'brum byi dong ga'i lde gu / /
mar ram til mar bcas bskol ba'i / /
sna sman sbrid pa rnags pa sel / /
sna skams pa la ba la'i mar / /
btung sogs sha khur sbyar ba bza' / /
snum gyi dud pa dugs kyis gso / /
sna rgyas la yang cho ga 'di'o / /
sna rnags 'bar la mkhris 'joms sman / /
chu 'dzag sna sman sogs rnos bya / /
rnags can la ni bad kan gyi / /

na le sham dang byi dang ga /
shing kun bu ram pi pi ling / /
lug thug gcin sbyar sna sman ni / /
slon byas 'og tu gtang bar bya / /
shi kru dan+da bri ha ti / /
tsha ba gsum dang lce myang tsha / /
bye'u rug pha dang byi dang ga / /
til mar bskol ba'i sna sman yang / /
btang na mchog tu phan pa yi / /
rnag dang khrag can sar pa ni / /
khrag gi cham pa lta bur gso / /
shin tu 'phel la rma 'khyims ltar / /
'brum bu rmen bu tsha ba la / /
dan ti dur byid lce myang tsha / /
ldong ros dang ni bi pi ling / /
tsi tra ka yi lde gu ni / /
mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba yi / /
reng bu snar ni gzhug par bya / /
shi kru la sogs sna sman yang / /
rnag can gso ba'i skabs su bshad / /
yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las /
phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu pa'o // //
de nas kha nad kyi dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o / /
nya dang ma he phag gi ni / /
sha dang la phug rjen pa dang / /
ma sha'i sran tshod 'o ma zho / /
cha dang bu ram shing kun dang / /
'brum phran kha sbubs nyal bsten dang / /
so shing gis snad goms pa spong / /

gtar ga dbug ni nyes pa yi / /
bad kan shas che'i nad 'khrugs pas / /
kha yi nang gi nad skyed 'gyur / /
de la rlung gis mchu gas 'gyur / /
mchu ral ba yi nad ces bshad / /
rlung gis mchu la gnod gyur pa / /
mchu sra nad tshabs che ba yin / /
mchu gas rdol bar 'gyur ba dang / /
gnag cing rtsub pa mchu 'khrugs yin / /
mkhris pa tsha ba mi bzod ser / /
'brum phran nyungs kar 'dra bas khyab / /

bad kan las gyur grang ba yis / /
mi bzod lci zhing skrang ba dang / /
'brum phran dkar pos khyab pa yin / /

na dang min rnag mi snyoms / /
khrag las gyur pa khrag 'dzag cing / /
khrag gi mdog dang 'dra ba dang / /
'di la 'bra go lta bu yi / /

rim gyis srin bu skye zhing 'gul / /
tshil gyur g.ya' zhing 'drul ba dang / /
skrang 'jam til mar lta bur 'dzag /

yang dang yang du 'bye 'gyur la / /
slar yang 'drub par 'gyur ba dang / /
mchu ni g.ya' bar byed pa yin / /

gzer zhing bcag pa snyam du sems / /

so 'gul so ni g.yo ba dang / /
za ba'i tshe na lhag par na / /
so sto so ni mi sdug par / /

so lhag so ni skyes pa ste / /
de ni 'phel ba zhes kyang bshad / /
skye bar 'gyur ba'i tshe na ni / /

rtsa bar bcas pa'i so la brtan / /

sbom che gnag la shas cher na / /
bcad pa 'drar snang rnag khrag 'dzag /
de ni so srin can zhes bya / /
bad kan dang ni khrag gis rnyil / /
rnags shing rul bar 'gyur ba dang / /

kha dri mnam gyur nyer bdar yin / /

gang zhig so ni 'gul gyur pa / /
de ni snad pa las byung yin / /

rkan gyi dbus su nad med sha //
'dus pa rkan 'dus zhes bya'o / /

'dus gyur rnag phugs gting ring zhing / /
mtshan ma kun dang ldan pa yin / /

mchan khung phyogs byung me'i mdog can / /
'dra ba de ni me skyed yin / /
zhag lnga'am ni zhag bdun na / /
zla ba phyed nas srog 'phrog byed / /
nad gzhi gsum skyes 'brum bu zlum / /
nam tshong yan chad skyes sa skor / /
mchan khung chu sor bi da ri'i / /
rtsa ba ltar sra bi da ri / /
tshil dang bad rlung las gyur pa'i / /
rmen bu rtsa rgyus sha la gnas / /
brtol na mar zhag sbrang rtsi 'dra / /
'dzag gyur de la rlung shas che / /
sha skam rmen bur byas nas ni / /
gseg ma lta bur skyed par byed / /
khrag ni dri mnam rangs pa dang / /
kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ba yi / /
nad kyis de la khrag 'dzag pa / /
de ni 'brum bu gseg ma can / /
lag pa rkang mthil tshigs dang ni / /
nam tshong yan chad grog mo yi / /
mgo ltar rim gyis rmen bu ni / /
phra mo mang pos khyab byed la / /
na zhing tsha la g.ya' zhing 'drul / /
kun tu skyes te grog mo'i mgo /
rkang mthil gshags mas brud pa'am / /
tsher ma sogs kyis snad pa yi / /
'brum bu bur pa ltar mtho ba / /
skyes te mdzer pa 'dra zhes bya / /
shugs bkag pa yis rlung dag ni / /
gzhang dang rkang pa la gnas pa / /
phyi dang nang du rgyu byed pa / /
lam rgyu de las bshang ba ni / /
dka' bas 'byung bar byed pa'i nad / /
gzhang 'gags pa zhes bya bar 'dod / /
rlung mkhris kyis ni sen mo yi / /
nang gi sha smin nad skyed pa / /
ma snad nad dang tshim pa dang / /
nye ba'i sen mo zhes bya'o / /
snad pas gnag cing rtsub pa dang / /
sra ba sen mo ngan zhes bya / /
'dam ni gnod byed la reg las / /
nang na g.ya' zhing rnag bcas pa / /
sor mo'i 'bras 'byer zhes bya'o / /
pags pa til 'dra gnag pa la / /
nad med byung gyur rme ba ste / /
de nyid 'bur ba mdzer pa yin / /
mdzer pa las kyang chen por gyur / /
dkar nag pags pa'i mdzer pa yin / /
de 'dra'i 'brum bu skyes pa ni / /
dmar po rgya skyegs nor bu yin / /
dkar ba'am gnag par lhan cig skyes / /
zlum pa'am mtshan ma zhes bya'o / /

'khrugs te gdong ni srab 'gyur zhing / /
thig le nag po ngo shig can / /
gdong las gzhan 'byung khabs zhes bya / /
rlung gyur ngo shig rtsub par snang / /
reg na rtsub cing gnag pa yin / /
mkhris gyur mtha' ma cung zad sngo / /
bad kan las gyur mtha' dkar g.ya' / /
khrag gyur mtha' ma zangs mdog can / /
skam zhing tsha ba tsag tsag byed / /
rlung gis bad kan bslangs gyur pa / /
pags par phyin te bskams gyur nas / /
de las pags pa skya 'gyur zhing / /
rim gyis tshor ba med 'gyur la / /
g.ya' ba chung zhing 'drul ba med / /
bem po de ni tshor med yin / /
skyug sman nyes dang ma zhu dang / /
bad mkhris lus la gnas bslangs pas / /
rab g.ya' zlum po gor gor po / /
dmar po mang du 'byung 'gyur zhing / /
rjes 'brel ldan pa zlum por bshad / /
de ltar nad ni phra mo yi / /
dbye ba sum cu drug tu bstan / /
yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las /
phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu gcig pa'o // //
de nas nad phra mo'i gso ba bshad par bya'o / /
ra yi 'gram pa ma smin pa / /
srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung ngo / /
nas 'dra dugs ni byas nas su / /
thang shing ru rta ldong ros dang / /
ba bla'i lde gu bskus te bzhu / /
rdo yi bong bu'ang de ltar gso / /

n+ya gro d+ha yi lo ma'am / /

sna sman dpral bar gtar ga gdab / /
pad+ma'i tsher ma nim pa yi / /

bid ril khrag gtar zhing / /

da nad til btags nas phyes bsku / /

de bzhin bags mdzer rgya skyegs nor / /

'o ma can shing myu gu shun / /
'o mar btags pas bsku bar bya / /

tsan+dan dmar po btsod dang ni / /
ru rta seng phrom pri yad+ku / /

lde gus ngo shig sel byed cing / /

zir gnyis dang til nag dang / /
yungs kar 'o mar bcas pa ni / /

'o mar btags pas bskus na phan / /

dreg nad la ni sle tres rab bsngags shing / /
pho ba'i nad la dar ba gsar pa mchog /
mdze la seng ldeng snying po bsten pas mchog /
nad kun la ni brag zhun rab tu bsngags / /
smyo byed nad la mar ni rnying pa phan / /
brjed byed nad la bram+hi'i rtsa ba phan / /
mya ngan la ni chang ni blud pas phan / /
gnyid med pa yi nad ni 'o mas sel / /
cham pa zho ni sbyar ma dag gis sel / /
rid pa'i nad la sha ni sbyin par bya / /
rlung gi nad la sgog skya rab tu bsngags / /
yan lag rengs pa'i nad ni dugs kyis sel / /
phrag pa phrag gong lag ngar na ba la / /
thang chu kha bor yi sna sman gtang / /
glad pa'i nad la mar sar hwags kyis sel / /
dmu rdzing rnga mo'i gcin dang 'o mas sel / /
mgo ba'i nad kun la ni sna sman bsngags / /
khong 'bras gsar du byung la gtar ga gdab / /
kha yi nad kun la ni mkhur bkang phan / /
mig nad sna sman mig sman brtabs sel / /
rgas pa la ni 'o ma zhun mar phan / /
brgyal la chu gang blugs dang grib ma phan / /
drod chung ngal dang sge'u gsher tsha ran phan / /
dub la chang 'thungs lus ni khrus byas phan / /
sdug bsngal bzod dang brtan la rtsol pa phan / /
gcin sri ba la gze ma phan pa yin / /
lud pa lu la kaN+Da ka ri phan / /
rtsib logs gzer la puSh+kar mU la phan / /
rgas sra ba la skyu ru ra phan zhing / /
rma la 'bras bu gsum dang gu gul phan / /
de ltar nad rnams kyi ni sman gyi mchog /
bshad pas nad rnams zhi bar nus pa yin / /
de ni yul dang dus kyi stobs las ni / /
ci rigs par ni brtags te sbyar bar bya / /
de ltar rgyun shes bu las gzhung gi mdo / /
legs par bshad pa des ni ma ngoms pas / /
me bzhin 'jug sogs blo mthun dad pas 'dud / /
the tshom 'di ni me bzhin 'jug gis dris / /
skal ldan kha cig bdag nyid mkhas / /
sman dang nad g.yog phun sum tshogs / /
sman pa rgan po'i lung gis ni / /
rjes su 'jug kyang nad bcas shing / /
nad kyis srog ni zad par snang / /
gzhan dag de las go bzlog snang / /
de phyir phan dang gnod pa yi / /
'bras bu nges pa ma mchis na / /
'dir ni bstan bcos kyis ci bstan / /
de ltar me bzhin 'jug sogs slob ma'i tshogs / /
rtog pa skyes la rgyun shes bu yis ni / /
de nyid ma lus rnam par bshad gyur pa / /
gso byas ma byas mnyam por bya mi rigs / /
yan lag drug cu ldan pa yi / /
gso byed bde 'gyur yod mod kyi / /
nad kyi 'dam du bying ba la / /
lag nas 'dren thabs sman yin no / /
'tsho dang 'chi bar 'gyur ba la / /
kun la sman yod ma yin zhing / /
thabs la ltos pa ma yin la / /
gzhan du thabs la ltos pa'i nad / /
thabs kyis bsgrubs na 'grub 'gyur bas / /
rgyu med par ni gtan tshigs min / /
gang yang khyed kyi phun tshogs ni / /
kun dang ldan pas gsos na yang / /
'chi 'gyur zhes smra de ma yin / /
thabs ni thabs min 'gyur yod min / /
gal te de lta'i thabs ldan zhing / /
blo ldan gso ba byas gyur kyang / /
sngon las nyes pa ma grub pas / /
yan lag bcu drug ldan med yin / /
me dang chu sogs dugs dang ni / /
rengs sogs mi 'grub su zhig zer / /
brta dang nyams smad 'o ma dang / /
'bras ngan mi byed su zhig 'dod / /
ma sha kha sral la sogs la / /
ro tsa mi nus su zhig zer / /
bshang gci bskyed dang mang bar ni / /
nad la the tshom su zhig zer / /
sngags dang rgyud ni med pa ru / /
gang gis dug ni 'jug par 'gyur / /
gag pa la sogs gso ba ni / /
med par gang zhig bde bar 'gyur / /
'on kyang dus min 'chi la sogs / /
grub mtha' kun tu nges par grags / /
'bad pa chen po dag gis ni / /
ji ltar gzhan gyis bzlog par nus / /
tsan+dan la sogs tsha sogs pa / /
lung las grags pa bzhin du sel / /
rims la smyung dang brta ba dag /
bstan bcos nyid las grags pa yin / /
yan lag bzhi pa'i yon tan 'byor / /
legs par brtags nas sbyar bya zhing / /
gzhan du nad kyi tshogs 'joms pa / /
gso ba the tshom bcas mi bya / /
'di ni dus min 'chi zhags pa / /
brtan po bcom par byed pa yin / /
nad kyis skrag cing 'jigs pa la / /
sngags med pa yi srung skud yin / /
'di ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnams / /
sel byed bdud rtsi mngon sum yin / /
snad ngan gnas na 'phral du ni / /
ha la ha lar 'gyur ba yin / /
bstan bcos nges pa mi shes shing / /
tshig tsam la ni rjes gzhol ba'i / /
gshin rje'i zhags pa thogs pa bzhin / /
sman pa ngan pa ring du spang / /
sman pa gzhung la legs mkhas shing / /
lung la mkhas pa'i bzang po dang / /
las la goms shing dge ba ni / /
bzang por 'dod pa dam pa yin / /
de ltar rgyud kyi yon tan ldan / /
rgyud kyi skyon ni spangs gyur pa / /
gso ba'i bstan bcos ma lus pa / /
khyab ste yongs su gnas pa yin / /
drang srong chen po'i gzhung rjes 'jug /
rgya che'i dri ma med pa'i gnas / /
rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab cing / /
bsdus don nye bar mtshon byed yin / /
sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa las / /
yan lag brgyad bsdus bdud rtsi'i tshogs thob gang / /
de las don chen rtsol ba zhan pa rnams / /
dga' bar bya phyir rgyud 'di logs shig byas / /
'di ni lud chen las grags shing / /
'bras bu mngon du ston byed pas / /
sngags dang 'dra bar legs sbyar gyi / /
log dpyod nam yang mi bya'o / /
'di bklags rtogs dang nyams blangs pas / /
tshe ring ba dang nad med dang / /
chos dang nor dang bde dang grags / /
nges par 'thob par 'gyur ba yin / /
'di ni bltas na bsdus don rtogs nus pas / /
rang gi goms las sman pas bskyod mi nus / /
rgya chen rgyud gzhan dag las goms gyur pas / /
mi bskyod gyur gang de ni ngo mtshar med / /
gal te tsa ra ka ni bslabs gyur des ni legs thos sogs / /
las bshad nad kyi ming tsam yang ni shes par 'gyur ma yin / /
tsa ra ka la ma bslabs gso ba dag ni ma goms pa'i / /
nyon mongs des ni nad pa rnams kyi gso ba ji ltar bya / /
mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis legs par bshad par gyur pa'ang / /
shin tu rmongs pas mngon par spyad par mi byed gang yin de / /
de ni dang por sman dpyad bstan bcos skyon med bklags gyur zhing / /
skyes bu tshe yis ji srid thub kyi bar du bslab par byed / /
rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan zhi bya'i phyir / /
til mar mar sar sbrang rtsi rim bzhin bsten / /
de ltar tshangs pa'am tshangs pa'i bu yis bshad / /
tshig gi dbye bas bshad kyang khyad 'phags med / /
ston pa po yi dbang gis ni / /
sman gyi nus pa khyad 'phags yin / /
de bas phrag dog spangs nas ni / /
bar ma nyid la bsten par bya / /
drang srong gis bshad phyir dga' na / /
legs thos tsa ra kar ma zad / /
lug stsogs kyis byas ci mi slob / /
de bas legs bshad gzung bar bya / /
'di ni tshe yi rig byed rgya mtsho yi / /
snying po las ni snying po blangs nas su / /
rnam par sbyar las dge ba gang thob pa / /
de yis 'gro bas de nyid mthong bar shog /
yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las /
phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu tham pa'o // //
sman pa'i bdag po dge 'dun gsang ba zhes bya ba'i bu sman pa chen po pha khol zhes bya bas yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po mdzad pa las /
rgyud phyi ma'i gnas te drug pa'o // //
sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba ji snyed pa rdzogs so // //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzA ran d+ha ra dang /
zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa // //
